0P00000TIH.F.summary: Using an active, fundamental management style, the portfolio manager selects equities of growth companies active in the real estate and property sectors and related sectors, offering a good balance between capital gains and yields.

AVIVE.AS.summary:
The investment objective is to achieve a return that equals the return of the benchmark ('Index'). The benchmark is the GPR Sustainable Real Estate Index Europe. This benchmark is compiled on the basis of shares that are assessed to be sustainable real estate companies, for which sustainability information is used that specifically relates to real estate companies. The companies are among other things assessed on the extent to which they contribute to the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) as prepared by the United Nations.
Investment policy
. ACTIAM Verantwoord Index Vastgoedfonds Europa invests on a passive basis in listed shares of European real estate companies that are part of the Index. 
 The currency risks arising from the portfolio investments are not hedged into euros.

BPSEU.AS.long_name: BNP Paribas Fund III N.V. - BNP Paribas Property Securities Fund Europe Classic
BPSEU.AS.summary: The fund invests worldwide in marketable shares of leading property companies in Europe, with the objective of realising a higher return than the Index over the medium term through active management. The Sub fund's investment policy is geared to generating both capital growth and direct investment income in the form of dividends.
BPSEU.AS.manager_bio: Menno joined ABN AMRO Asset Management in March 2001 with eight years of (direct/indirect) property investment experience. Prior to joining ABN AMRO, he finished his study at Rodamco Continental Europe in 1993. In 1994, Menno started his working career at Achmea Global Investors, initially working on the real estate research side as a portfolio manager of real estate securities. He was responsible for real estate securities in both Europe and the Asia Pacific. In 1997, he joined MN-Services as a portfolio manager of international real estate, responsible for both direct real estate and real estate securities in Europe and the Asia Pacific. Menno earned a masterâs degree in geography from the University of Groningen in 1993.
BPSEU.AS.family: BNP PARIBAS ASSET MANAGEMENT Nederland NV

DDPFA.AS.long_name: DD Property Fund N.V. klasse A EUR Inc
DDPFA.AS.summary: DD Property Fund N.V. is a sustainable real estate fund with the focus on Europe that invests in approximately 20 to 30 exchange listed quality real estate companies. Investing in debt of real estate companies is possible. The capital of the fund that not has been invested can be hold in cash.
DDPFA.AS.manager_bio: Remco is a Dutch investment veteran who has worked on the buy- and sellside with various investment organisations.

DDPFB.AS.long_name: DD Property Fund N.V. klasse B EUR Inc
DDPFB.AS.summary: DD Property Fund N.V. is a sustainable real estate fund with the focus on Europe that invests in approximately 20 to 30 exchange listed quality real estate companies. Investing in debt of real estate companies is possible. The capital of the fund that not has been invested can be hold in cash.
DDPFB.AS.manager_bio: Remco is a Dutch investment veteran who has worked on the buy- and sellside with various investment organisations.

KBEPF.AS.summary: The Fund employs a bottom-up strategy to construct a portfolio of European property companies. The Fund primarily aims to generate a better long-term total return than the FTSE EPRA/NAREIT Developed Europe Index, comprising capital gains or losses plus net dividend. The Shareholderâs return will comprise movements in the price of Shares in the Fund as well as dividends to be paid by the Fund, if any.
